mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_SOM(ID, SOM_TITLE, SOM_CATEGORY, SOM_ADDRESS, SOM_TYPE, SOM_START_DATE, SOM_END_DATE, SOM_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID) VALUES(SEQ_SOM.NEXTVAL, #{somTitle}, #{somCategory}, #{somAddress}, #{somType}, #{somStartDate}, #{somEndDate}, #{somContent}, #{memberId})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, SOM_TITLE, SOM_CATEGORY, SOM_ADDRESS, SOM_TYPE, SOM_START_DATE, SOM_END_DATE, SOM_LIKE, SOM_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID FROM TBL_SOM
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO TBL_SOM_CHECK ( ID, SOM_CHECK_IS_CHECKED, SOM_CHECK_CONTENT, MEMBER_ID, SOM_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_SOM_CHECK.NEXTVAL,
'Y' 'N' , #{somCheckContent}, #{memberId}, #{somId} )
mapper.select: SELECT sc.ID AS sc_id, CASE sc.SOM_CHECK_IS_CHECKED WHEN 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS sc_is_checked, sc.SOM_CHECK_CONTENT AS sc_content, sc.MEMBER_ID AS sc_member_id, sc.SOM_ID AS sc_som_id, sci.ID AS sci_id, sci.SOM_CHECK_IMAGE_PATH AS sci_path, sci.SOM_CHECK_IMAGE_NAME AS sci_name, sci.SOM_CHECK_ID AS sci_check_id FROM TBL_SOM_CHECK sc LEFT JOIN TBL_SOM_CHECK_IMAGE sci ON sc.ID = sci.SOM_CHECK_ID WHERE sc.ID = #{id}
